preqs: Any of DWG1201, DWG1202, DWG1301, DWG1103, DWG1201, or permission from Studio Coordinator.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {DWG1102, DWG1201, DWG1202, DWG1301, DWG1401}

description: An intense study of the visible world. Through class projects, sustained attention will provide greater insights into the aesthetic and expressive qualities of forms and spaces and give opportunities to explore a variety of technical and conceptual means towards their appropriate representation.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
